Programme.name: The Revenant
Programme.description: Leonardo DiCaprio is attacked by a crazy bear in this new impressive TV spot of The Revenant, the upcoming epic adventure drama movie directed by Alejandro G. Inarritu and starring Leonardo DiCaprio

Programme.name: Ride Along 2
Programme.description: As his wedding day approaches, Ben heads to Miami with his soon-to-be brother-in-law James to bring down a drug dealer who is supplying the dealers of Atlanta with product.

Programme.name: Star Wars: Episode VII
Programme.description: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.

Programme.name: The Big Short
Programme.description: Four denizens in the world of high-finance predict the credit and housing bubble collapse of the mid-2000s, and decide to take on the big banks for their greed and lack of foresight.

Programme.name: Creed
Programme.description: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

Programme.name: The 5th Wave
Programme.description: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth decimated. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.

Programme.name: Daddys Home
Programme.description: Stepdad, Brad Whitaker, is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when the biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

Programme.name: Room
Programme.description: After five-year-old Jack and his mother escape from the enclosed surroundings that Jack has known his entire life, the boy makes a thrilling discovery.

Programme.name: The Hateful Eight
Programme.description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Programmes.Programme: > The Danish Girl A fictitious love story loosely inspired by the lives of Danish artists Lili Elbe and Gerda Wegener. Lili and Gerda s marriage and work evolve as they navigate Lili s groundbreaking journey as a transgender pioneer. 34 12 images/danish.jpg
